personal_info.name: Jeet Dagar
personal_info.professional_summary: Experienced DevOps Engineer and AWS Solution Architect with proven expertise in designing and implementing scalable cloud infrastructure solutions. Specialized in containerization, CI/CD automation, and infrastructure as code, with a track record of handling high-traffic applications serving 30k-40k daily users. Demonstrated success in cost optimization, achieving $2000/month savings, and improving system reliability through comprehensive monitoring solutions. Strong background in customer-facing technical advisory roles and cross-functional collaboration.

work_experience.description: Customer-Facing Technical Advisor: Acted as the primary technical point of contact for a diverse portfolio of clients, guiding them through their cloud journey.
responsibilities: Architectural Design and Strategy: Designed and implemented scalable, highly available, and fault-tolerant cloud solutions tailored to specific business requirements

AWS Well-Architected Reviews: Conducted comprehensive reviews of customer workloads to identify areas for improvement in cost optimization, security, reliability, performance efficiency, and operational excellence
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Worked in close partnership with sales, product, and engineering teams to ensure the successful deployment and adoption of AWS services
Continuous Learning and Enablement: Maintained deep expertise across the ever-evolving AWS platform and created technical content, such as workshops and presentations, to educate customers
achievements: Guided diverse portfolio of clients through successful cloud transformation journeys
Delivered comprehensive AWS Well-Architected Reviews improving customer workload efficiency
Created technical workshops and presentations for customer education and enablement

work_experience.description: Senior DevOps Engineer responsible for designing and implementing scalable infrastructure solutions for high-traffic applications and enterprise clients.

projects.name: Western Railways Website
projects.description: Developed and implemented scalable infrastructure for comprehensive train service website
achievements: Handled 30k-40k daily users with optimal performance
Enabled scaling to support up to 5 million users using Kubernetes and Helm
Reduced deployment time by 70% using Terraform IaC
Reduced MTTR by 40% with comprehensive monitoring setup

projects.name: Childcare Website Project
projects.description: Developed and deployed infrastructure for childcare website with zero-downtime deployment strategies
achievements: Implemented Blue-Green Deployment for zero-downtime releases
Ensured high availability and performance through comprehensive monitoring
Created secure and scalable architecture with proper DNS management

projects.name: Mobile Website Infrastructure
projects.description: Architected resilient and scalable infrastructure for mobile website
achievements: Built resilient and scalable infrastructure using AWS services
Enhanced maintainability and scalability using CloudFormation
Optimized content delivery through CloudFront CDN

personal_projects.name: End-to-End Deployment of a Three-Tier DevSecOps Project
personal_projects.description: Comprehensive three-tier application deployment on AWS EKS with full CI/CD automation and security integration
key_features: Three-tier application architecture on AWS EKS
Comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana
Security scanning with SonarQube and Trivy
achievements: Reduced setup time by 50% using Terraform automation
Achieved 95% deployment success rate with zero downtime
Cut manual intervention by 80% using ArgoCD
Improved issue detection time by 40% with monitoring stack

expert: AWS (EC2, S3, EKS, Route53, CloudFront, SSM, RDS)

leadership_experience.description: Led educational initiatives for underprivileged students, supporting their overall development and academic growth
responsibilities: Managed educational programs for 11th and 12th grade students
Coordinated with volunteers and staff to deliver quality education
Supported overall development of underprivileged students

leadership_experience.description: Leadership role in National Cadet Corps demonstrating discipline, teamwork, and organizational skills

blog_posts.title: Securing EKS with KMS Encryption, Private Networking, and CloudWatch Logging
blog_posts.description: In this post, we'll explore how to create a highly secure Amazon EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service) cluster using eksctl. Our focus will be on key security configurations, including envelope encryption of Kubernetes secrets with AWS Key Management Service (KMS), extensive CloudWatch logging for monitoring, and private subnets for network isolation.

blog_posts.title: Automating Web Server Deployment with Ansible
blog_posts.description: A comprehensive guide to automating web server deployment using Ansible playbooks, covering best practices for infrastructure automation and configuration management.
